text: Evelise Maria Tavares da Veiga (born 3 March 1996) is a Portuguese long jumper who also competes in triple jump events. She won two silver medals at the 2019 Summer Universiade in Naples, Italy. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |2013 |World Youth Championships |Donetsk, Ukraine |23rd (q) |Long jump |5.63 m |- |2014 |Lusophony Games |Goa, India |bgcolor=gold|1st |Long jump |5.86 m |- |rowspan=2|2015 |rowspan=2|European Junior Championships |rowspan=2|Eskilstuna, Sweden |9th |Long jump |6.02 m (w) |- |10th |Triple jump |12.61 m |- |rowspan=2|2017 |rowspan=2|European U23 Championships |rowspan=2|Bydgoszcz, Poland |5th |Long jump |6.43 m |- |12th |Triple jump |13.00 m |- |rowspan=3|2018 |Mediterranean U23 Championships |Jesolo, Italy |bgcolor=gold|1st |Long jump |6.26 m |- |Mediterranean Games |Tarragona, Spain |5th |Long jump |6.61 m |- |European Championships |Berlin, Germany |8th |Long jump |6.47 m |- |rowspan=3|2019 |rowspan=2|Universiade |rowspan=2|Naples, Italy |bgcolor=silver|2nd |Long jump |6.61 m |- |bgcolor=silver|2nd |Triple jump |13.81 m |- |World Championships |Doha, Qatar |18th (q) |Triple jump |13.89 m |} == References == Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:People from Santiago, Cape Verde Category:Portuguese female long jumpers Category:Universiade silver medalists for Portugal Category:Universiade medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Black Portuguese sportspeople Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2018 Mediterranean Games Category:Medalists at the 2019 Summer Universiade
title: Evelise Veiga
